MssqlConnectionString: A string you can get from portal.azure.com > Sql Database > Connection strings > ADO.NET (SQL authentication)
DataLakeConnectionString: A string you can get from portal.azure.com > storage account > Access keys > key1 > Connection string
DataLakeContainer: The name on the container in the storage, where you will save data. Could be: ejendomme
EloverblikToken: A token that you easily creates in Eloverblik by logging in and go 'Mit overblik' in upper right corner. Then select 'DATADELING'
